direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide a string representation of the object and compare it with another object, respectively.
Both methods involve generating a unique representation of the object, one as a string and the other as an integer hash code.
Both methods access the internal state of the map to retrieve information, one for a string representation and the other for a value associated with a key.
The toString method indirectly depends on the state set by the put method, as the string representation includes the key-value pairs set by put.
Both methods handle unsupported operations by throwing UnsupportedOperationException, which can be tested for similar exception scenarios.
